resources.string: Enable filter to protect your eyes

What we call blue light refers to visible light with a wavelength of 380–500 nm. As one of the three primary colors of natural light, blue light is the shortest wavelength and highest frequency high energy light, and thus it is widely used in LED technology to improve electronic products quality.
The harm of blue light to the human eye is mainly manifested in the eye pathology hazards and human rhythm hazards that cause myopia, cataracts, and macular degeneration.
You can use flashlight at night, and we will not use the permission for other use.
Before installing other apps, please turn off this app to enable installation.
"When taking screenshots, please turn off this app in case screenshots use the app's effects."
Eye Protector Permission Requirements and Precautions
You don’t have Google play installed, and you don’t even have a browser
